sections.text: Wharton’s MBA is a two‑year, full‑time general management program designed to build analytical rigor, leadership, and strategic decision‑making for impact across industries.

items: Flexible core with analytics, economics, leadership, and management
Majors and elective pathways across 200+ courses
Experiential learning (Wharton Investment & Trading Group, Global Modular Courses, etc.)
sections.text: Students complete a flexible core and choose from extensive electives and majors, with hands‑on experiences through labs, ventures, and global modules.

items: Completion of core and major/elective requirements
sections.text: Degree completion requires core, major, and elective credits along with leadership/communication milestones as defined by Wharton.
Graduates lead in consulting, finance, technology, healthcare, and entrepreneurship, supported by Wharton’s global alumni network.
